name: MicroMechanicManualATB
description:
Prototype - micro mechanic:

-spacebar to charge

-enter to move after fully charging

Prototype - Versatile Verb:

-click to produce egg

-hold down mouse button to increase size of egg produced

Prototype - Unique Interaction:

Unfinished

Asset credits for all scenes:

micro mechanic: background from “castle platform” by “Jetrel” opengameart.org/content/castle-platformer

Versatile Verb: “Bunny Rabbit LPC style for PixelFarm” by “Redshrike” opengameart.org/content/bunny-rabbit-lpc-style-for-pixelfarm

“easter egg” by “fraang" opengameart.org/content/easter-egg 

Unique Interaction: "rescue vehicles" by bart https://opengameart.org/content/rescue-vehicles

"Cartoon firemen in action" Designed by Freepik.com
